sn47.22:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma bhaddo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn47.22:1.3: “ko nu kho, avuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathagate parinibbute saddhammo na ciratthitiko hoti?
sn47.22:1.4: Ko panavuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathagate parinibbute saddhammo ciratthitiko hoti”ti?
sn47.22:2.2: Bhaddako kho te, avuso bhadda, ummango, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
sn47.22:2.4: ‘ko nu kho, avuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathagate parinibbute saddhammo na ciratthitiko hoti?
sn47.22:2.5: Ko panavuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathagate parinibbute saddhammo ciratthitiko hoti’”ti?
sn47.22:2.7: “Catunnam kho, avuso, satipatthananam abhavitatta abahulikatatta tathagate parinibbute saddhammo na ciratthitiko hoti.
sn47.22:2.8: Catunnanca kho, avuso, satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagate parinibbute saddhammo ciratthitiko hoti.
sn47.22:3.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.22:3.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.22:3.6: Imesam kho, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam abhavitatta abahulikatatta tathagate parinibbute saddhammo na ciratthitiko hoti.
sn47.22:3.7: Imesanca kho, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta tathagate parinibbute saddhammo ciratthitiko hoti”ti.
